definition: son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: The Box Hill line, causing trouble for Zhao Yingxiong.
sentences.chinese: 匣子上山一行，爲趙英雄帶來了麻煩。

sentences.english: She made a small casket with paper board.
sentences.chinese: 她用紙板做了一個匣子。

sentences.english: Despite their importance, black boxes use technology that is hardly state-of-the-art.
sentences.chinese: 但儘管它們如此重要，黑匣子採用的卻並非最新技術。

sentences.english: EU proposes 'black boxes' for buses and taxis.
sentences.chinese: 歐盟擬爲公交車輛裝“黑匣子”。

sentences.english: A man of the state of Zheng bought the casket but gave back the pearls.
sentences.chinese: 鄭國人只買了他的匣子，而退還了他的珍珠。

sentences.english: The application is much like a black box, with no granularity available outside it.
sentences.chinese: 應用程序很像一個黑匣子，沒有粒度可用於外部。

sentences.english: Letters in the case sealing the memory of the youth.
sentences.chinese: 木匣子裏的信件，塵封着少年的回憶。

sentences.english: Could China wipe out an American military advantage with a simple black box?
sentences.chinese: 中國能夠僅僅用一個黑匣子就摧毀美國的軍事優勢嗎？

sentences.english: Afterwards, Paul will be offered boxes with Spain and Holland flags on the front.
sentences.chinese: 以後，保羅將面對前面有西班牙和荷蘭國旗的匣子。

sentences.english: A few drinks will help to break the ice at the party.
sentences.chinese: 宴會上喝幾杯酒，會有助於人們打開話匣子。

sentences.english: I sneaked in and opened his treasure box.
sentences.chinese: 我偷偷地走進去，打開了他的寶貝匣子。

sentences.english: Frank talked away like a chatter box.
sentences.chinese: 弗蘭克像個話匣子說個沒完。

sentences.english: Wei Gong opened the chatterbox, casually about their research on Feng shui.
sentences.chinese: 魏公便打開了話匣子，隨口講起自己對風水的研究。

sentences.english: He couldn’t have lasted five minutes with a chatterbox.
sentences.chinese: 他受不了話匣子，最多能忍耐五分鐘。

sentences.english: In front of the taxi drivers, I just firmly secured, chatterbox will be opened.
sentences.chinese: 眼前的這位出租車司機，我剛坐穩，話匣子便打開了。

sentences.english: Second black box of crashed Germanwings A320 to be transported to Paris.
sentences.chinese: 墜毀的德翼A320第二個黑匣子將運抵巴黎。

definition: drawer/stackable cooking vessel/woven mat on a bed frame or chair/woven window screen
cloth pouch open in the middle, forming two bags/jacket worn for Chinese wrestling
